description:
Having heard the truth from Rubber, Brian is reunited with Zeno in Mt. Minakami and suggests to rescue children together, but Zeno doesn`t listen. While they fight, the doomsday for the Earth, another Gray Shock is about to happen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce monde pourri touche à sa fin
Kuso Mitai na Sekai wa Kanarazu Owaru
Shitty World Will in Fact Come to an End
クソみたいな世界は必ず終わる
